title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee from the tyrannical Immortan Joe and his army in a high-octane chase for freedom.

title: The Notebook
description: A heartwarming tale of enduring love, chronicling the lifelong romance between Noah and Allie, who are separated by social differences and reunited years later.

title: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, unintentionally influences several historical events in the 20th century United States through his simple yet profound outlook on life.

title: The Hangover
description: After a wild bachelor party in Las Vegas, three groomsmen must retrace their steps to find their missing friend before his wedding.

title: La La Land
description: An aspiring actress and a jazz musician fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles, facing the challenges of balancing ambition and romance.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American man uncovers a disturbing secret when he meets his white girlfriend's family, leading to a chilling and satirical exploration of racism.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Wrongly convicted of murder, banker Andy Dufresne forms a life-changing friendship with fellow inmate Red, finding hope and eventual redemption within the confines of Shawshank prison.

title: Superbad
description: Two high school friends embark on a chaotic quest to procure alcohol for a party, aiming to impress their crushes before graduation.
